name: Wood Block The Puzzle Game
description:
Boosters cost coins to use, which you can earn during gameplay by playing or by watching a sponsor's video.
You will earn free boosters by performing big line collections (3 or more lines).

If this isn't appealing to you feel free to ignore them! No Pressure!

Undo Booster - Take back your last move
Reshuffle Booster - Replace some or all of the blocks in your hand. Very useful if you can't find a place for all the blocks.

Don't Miss Out!
Play for free!
